EmailTemplate.name: IPM Notify Project Leader about FL confirm TLD change On Email Notification Obj
EmailTemplate.subject: Finance Leader confirmed the Target Launch Date change
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Your Finance Leader has confirmed that the Business Case for {!IPM_EmailOut_Notification__c.Project_Name__c} is up to date following the recent Target Launch Date change for {!IPM_EmailOut_Notification__c.MCO_Country_Name__c}.
